visual_truth_vision.concept: Visual Truth Engine transforms raw asset data into verifiable, immutable visual records
visual_truth_vision.value_proposition: See the truth, not just read about it
visual_truth_vision.differentiation: Competitors show data; Proveniq shows proof

priority_1.name: Immutable Ledger Core
priority_1.evidence: Block-based claim records with cryptographic linking

priority_2.name: AI Risk Layer
priority_2.evidence: Anomaly detection + fraud scoring via Gemini

priority_3.name: Audit Infrastructure
priority_3.evidence: Full action logging with user attribution

market_positioning.tagline: The Immutable Record of Physical Asset State

investment_thesis.network_effects: More records → More trust → More participants
investment_thesis.lock_in_mechanism: Historical data cannot be recreated elsewhere
